channel.title: Need help putting my server online
channel.description:
Hey guys,
I'm aware of how to put a 317 server online, but I have come to realize that it is much different with a 718/742. All I need to know is how to let someone else play it. My no-ip is already set up, I have already port-forwarded my router, but how do I change it to my no-ip, then distribute it to a few of my friends? In a 317, you change it through client.java, but there is no ip address to change in client.java on a 718 client. If anyone could explain to me which file that I change the ip address in, I would be very thankful.
P.S. I am aware that I must change the ip back to 127.0.0.1 after I have distributed it to others, so that I can play it.
THANKS!

item.title: Need help putting my server online
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Teh Gangsta, post:7, topic:485744”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=603977.msg4223771#msg4223771 date=1360904146]

Loader.java.

I went into Loader.java, then changed the 127.0.0.1 to my no-ip
I sent a link to my friends but they couldn’t connect. Do I have to set up a .jar file?
I sent them a .bat file (converted to zip) to open the client, but they received this error: error:could not find or load main class loader. Any help on that?

You must send the whole client…
[/quote]
I’m obviously failing at something… I sent them the entire client, but they received the same error ._.
Could you add me on Skype and show me through TeamViewer? I’ll pm you my Skype if you want…[/quote]

My skype is on the “Team J-Program” thread…

Read full topic
item.source: Need help putting my server online

I sent a link to my friends but they couldn’t connect. Do I have to set up a .jar file?
I sent them a .bat file (converted to zip) to open the client, but they received this error: error:could not find or load main class loader. Any help on that?
[/quote]
You must send the whole client…[/quote]
I’m obviously failing at something… I sent them the entire client, but they received the same error ._.
Could you add me on Skype and show me through TeamViewer? I’ll pm you my Skype if you want…
